mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DL_PART ( DL_PART_ID , DL_ID , ST_TM , ED_TM , TM_CTR , PLACE , DL_FILE , CONT , MAP ) VALUES ( 'DP-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') || '-' || LPAD(DL_PART_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , 'dailyId' , #{startTime} , #{endTime} , #{timeController} , #{place} , 'test' , #{content} , 'map' )
